name: Awaken (itch) (Tilt The Windmill)
description:
Play in fullscreen with the navigation bar hidden for the best experience.

This is a piece of interactive fiction I made in 2013 and have updated to 2020 Twine standards (mostly).

Explores the idea of recursive horror.

Some of the pauses are rather long, so if you have to wait more than 10 seconds try and restart.
